title: Axis Bank search panel sets sights on BoB CEO
content: he search panel looking for a successor for Axis Bank CEO Shikha Sharma is understood to be considering P S Jayakumar, chief executive of Bank of Baroda (BoB). Jayakumar, a former Citibanker, is the first lateral recruit into the top position at a public-sector bank (PSB) and whose term comes to an end this year.
